text: 8:7 1 Korin 1:5; 16:1-2; 2 Korin 9:8Bizir ia amiba bar, da guizbangɨra bar dera. Ia nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Godɨn ikia, deravɨram an gun mɨgei. Egha ia fofozir ekiam ikia, Godɨn ingangarim damuasa bar moghɨra ifonge. Egha ia uaghan e bagha bar ifonge. Kamaghɨra, datɨrɨghɨn ia apangkuvir arazimɨn gɨn mangɨva a gisɨn arazir bar aghuir kam isafuragh ingangarir kam damu.
